title: Trump Climate Rollbacks Face Legal Scrutiny (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Climate Rollbacks Face Legal Scrutiny (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Charles Warren, a partner at Kramer Levin Naftalis and Frankel, and Patrick Parenteau, a professor at the Vermont Law School, discuss the backlash against President Trump’s executive order rolling back several Obama-era climate rules. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
